content: I don't know which area you are planning to visit. however, many cities and regions have designated bike routes that offer scenic views and interesting stops along the way. you can try searching online for bike routes in the area you're visiting, and look for reviews or suggestions from other cyclists. you can also check with the bike rental companies or local tourism offices for recommendations. some popular scenic bike routes in the us include the california coast bike route, the katy trail state park in missouri, and the great allegheny passage in pennsylvania and maryland.
